version_description:
Scanner Pro is ready for the iPad Pro.

Scan, preview and share your documents with the most advanced iPad.

Thanks to everyone for your support! If you have a moment, please, leave us a review on iTunes to encourage others to install Scanne

Thanks to everyone for your support. It really helped us become the best scanning app worldwide! This update brings new features and is free of charge:

+ Default Scan Name. Now you can set a default name template and it will be applied to all futur

We are super excited to announce a major update to the most popular scanning app for iPhone and iPad.

Scanner Pro 7 is MUCH better and all existing customers are getting it for free.

Enjoy using the new and improved features of Scanner Pro

+ Added 9 OCR languages: Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Danish, Greek, Croatian, Estonian, Ukrainian.
+ Improved distortion correction technology.
+ Stability improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for using Scanner Pr

+ Copy all text from recognised document with one tap.
+ General performance and stability improvements.

Thank you for using Scanner Pro! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

+ General performance and stability improvements

Thank you for using Scanner Pro! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

+ iOS 10 Compatibility. Scanner Pro is fully compatible with iOS 10 now.
+ iMessage Extension. Easily create and share scanned documents without leaving your conversation.

Please, spend a minute and leave a quick review in the App Store. It real

+ Numerous bug fixes and improvements for iMessage Extension.
+ General performance and stability improvements for iOS 10.

Thank you for using Scanner Pro! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

+ Numerous bug fixes and improvements for iMessage Extension.
+ General performance and stability improvements for iOS 10.

Thank you for using Scanner Pro! If you have a moment to leave a review in the App Store we would really appreciate it.

Hello folks!
This week we've been working on a number of "quality of life" improvements to Scanner Pro.
Thanks for your continuing feedback. We love hearing from you!
If you need us, you can find us at rdsupport@readdle.com

Hello there!
Though iOS 13 is about a few months away from its official release, our Scanner Pro has got one step closer to its compatibility.
Today’s update brings some fixes for the UI issues detected in the app on iOS 13 beta.
Thank you to t

Scanner Pro is fully compatible with iOS 13 now!
We’re incredibly excited about the arrival of the new iOS and we hope you love this update as much as we do.
As always, you can reach us at rdsupport@readdle.com
Keep the feedback coming!

Another “spit and polish” release, addressing many of the most common issues you’ve told us about.
Please keep the feedback coming at rdsupport@readdle.com
And stay tuned! New features are coming soon!

Hello folks!
The word of the day for today’s update is Stability.
From unexpected behaviors to crashes, we’ve slain a large number of bugs that should result in a more stable, more predictable Scanner Pro for everyone.

In today's update we've included a bunch of fixes and improvements based on your feedback, so thank you!
If you have questions or need support just pop on over to rdsupport@readdle.com and we'll point you in the right direction.

Hello folks!
Today's update contains a handful of important fixes including the issue where some customers were having troubles signing in to their OneNote account in Scanner app.
Thank you to everyone who wrote in and helped us track down the step

Today’s update is all about magic – Magical Shadow Removal is at your service!
Now you’ll get top-notch shadow free scans even in low-light conditions. Update the app and give it a try!
We’ve also addressed some fax issues you were experiencing and

Hello folks! The word of the day for today’s update is _stability_.
From unexpected behaviors to crashes on specific images with shadows, we’ve slain a large number of bugs that should result in a more stable, more predictable Scanner Pro for everyone.

Today’s update is mainly about new features – Displaying documents from iCloud, “Select All” function and Flashlight instead of a flash on camera!
Let’s dive in, shall we?

## Displaying documents from iCloud

Meet Scanner Pro on iOS 14!
It’s our favorite time of year again! Alongside the wonderful update from Apple, Scanner Pro is here and ready with a cavalcade of new features:

*** Full support of Widgets

Happy upcoming holidays, folks!
Before the final rush of the season, we wanted to provide you with one more update that brings a few extra bug fixes and performance improvements.
